title: Bronze ADC Main LF Duo/Team

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
Hey all,

I am looking for a Bronze Team and/or a Duo partner
After tilting hard and refusing to quit for too long I took a break from the game
I am now back, be it still in bronze... but slowly getting out

I enjoy the ADC role
fav champs - Trist/Sivir/Corki
least fav champs - Kogmaw/Miss Fortune/Jinx

replies.body: heya give me and add, play a couple norms later to sync up and then we can help one another out :) i main sup, horrible at support Ez and Kalista :P fine with the rest as long as the adc knows how to play their champ :)
willing to help a fellow adc main i can top or jg but use kog adc to climb to gold on my main if want to duo with me add me Slashers
